collection.name: The Kraken Lore
collection.description: Welcome to ‘The Kraken Lore,’ where fiction unfolds like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered. Dive into a world of enchanting stories, from mythical realms to untamed adventures. Immerse yourself in the extraordinary, where every page reveals a new wonder.

c9852a1de20a.name: Grim Flandango
c9852a1de20a.bio: I write dirty stories that may or may not have monsters in them, depending on my mood. I can write 2k words on just about anything- except for a coherent bio.

75a347a27853.name: Damien Lawless
75a347a27853.bio: TechRotica author, as well as the 3 main Book Series: ElderTree, Ladies 2.0, and the Morrigan Collection.

e27039d31c47.name: CJ Coop
e27039d31c47.bio: British storyteller captivating readers with suspenseful science fiction tales. Exploring the intersection of science, technology, and human emotion..

1d4e220eaf8a.name: Sweet Chaos
1d4e220eaf8a.bio: Can you save Cinco de Mayo?! 🎉 https://medium.com/the-fictioneers-treasure-trove/mays-celebratory-scavenger-hunt-4deef3c578b6

e28df4acad4.name: Keg Umian
e28df4acad4.bio: 1x Top Writer in “Space” — Writing about what I loved learning and find interesting. Come ride through the veins of curiosity!

f01cc3558897.name: Sieran Lane
f01cc3558897.bio: A gay, trans, nonbinary psychotherapist. He/him pronouns. Writes both fiction and nonfiction, in LGBTQ+, social justice, psychology, art, and culture.

bd45a291dd8d.name: Bradan Writes Stories
bd45a291dd8d.bio: I'm a bacterial bard, and my inkwell is infectious. As disease diplomat, allow my quarantine quill to prescribe a cure, my tales of fantasy to ease your malady.

paragraphs.name: 26b3
paragraphs.text: Photo by Natalia Y. on Unsplash

Mrs. Birch couldn’t pinpoint the exact moment she began to hate her neighbors. There wasn’t a specific event, or action, that changed things. It was just a gradual process that snuck up on her over time.
It must have started after Phillip passed. He’d always been the more social of…

paragraphs.name: 3ce6
paragraphs.text: As Evelyn gazed out of the open truck window, her fingers danced in the sunshine. Leaves in vibrant shades of red, orange, and yellow floated on the gentle breeze creating a fragrant carpet. Leaning her head towards the window, she inhaled deeply of her favorite season. Releasing a contented sigh…

paragraphs.name: c592
paragraphs.text: Nasilie Maeror sitting atop his throne, generated by the author using AI

paragraphs.name: 71fd
paragraphs.text: The throne hall of House Maeror tried to conceal its true grandeur.

Unlike the abundantly lit salons of the other Houses, here the air was permanently filled with man-made penumbra. The gigantic chandeliers hanging between the beams had pale and scarcely lit candles, throwing half-made transitory shadows over the room.
